remarks: Lemma for weak version of ~ ax-12 .  Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes.  In some cases, this lemma may lead to shorter proofs than ~ ax12w .  (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2017.)
statement:
ax12wlemw.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ax12wlem $p |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) ) $.
$d ps x $.
